WATCH:  Indy Big Band Christmas Caroling musicians spread holiday cheer to those in need
items.description: In a quiet Indianapolis neighborhood, a special group of musicians stepped up to spread some much-needed Christmas spirit to families in need.

items.title: Russia targets Kyiv with deadly strikes ahead of Trump-Zelenskyy meeting
items.description: Explosions boomed across Kyiv for hours as ballistic missiles and drones hit the city in an attack that began early in the morning.

items.title: Winter weather hits Northeast as new storm system moves across country

items.title: WATCH:  Major winter storm lashes Northeast
items.description: Heavy snow fell throughout the Northeast on Friday, as southern Connecticut through the Hudson Valley saw anywhere from 2 to 6 inches of snow.

items.title: Georgia inmates threatened to kill Lyft driver during escape, affidavit reveals

items.title: Man charged with fatal shooting of woman during backyard target practice
items.description: The victim was sitting with her family under a covered porch several blocks away when she was hit by a bullet, according to a probable cause affidavit...

items.title: WATCH:  Stranded turtles rescued and flown to warmer water
items.description: Various organizations teamed up to get the "cold-stunned" sea turtles out of frigid Cape Cod waters.

items.title: Winter storm snarls U.S. holiday travel across Northeast, Great Lakes

items.title: WATCH:  Hero middle schoolers help save bus driver
items.description: Surveillance video from inside a school bus shows the moment heroic students in Ashland, Ohio, helped save a bus driver in medical distress.

items.title: Michigan hires former Utah coach Kyle Whittingham to lead the Wolverines
items.description: The university fired ex-coach Sherrone Moore on Dec. 10 for having an "inappropriate relationship" with a female staffer.

items.title: Sure, the newspaper informed. But as it fades, those who used it for other things must adjust, too
12/27: Saturday Morning
items.description: Major storms across the U.S. are threatening holiday travel. Meanwhile, President Trump and Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy are set to meet.
